description: This file defines a custom Android UI component called GoldChipView, which is a focusable, selectable UI chip with a gold-themed appearance designed for Android TV interfaces. It manages its selected state, visual styles, and interaction behavior.

classes.name: GoldChipView
classes.description: A custom UI component representing a focusable, selectable gold-colored chip with specific styling for Android TV.

methods.name: setSelectedState
methods.description: Explicitly set the chip's selected state, updating visual appearance accordingly.

methods.name: isSelectedState
methods.description: Return whether the chip is currently selected.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the view with default styling, behavior, and layout parameters.
